author: BBT
title: The growing popularity of 'Bleisure'
text:
The growing popularity of 'Bleisure' 0 comments Follow @BBT_online 
It may be one of the most ugly and infuriating words in the industry but 'Bleisure' is a trend that has soared among business travellers. 
According to research from The Europe Hotel & Resort, one in five 35 to 64 year olds are combing a business trip with a leisure holiday, however 59 per cent of travel buyers say they do not have a policy in place for this. 
This handy infographic, Bleisure, The Growing Trend in Business Travel, shows its growing popularity among employees...
